title: Silence of the Sleep
notes: The only issue that I noticed was that windowed modes do not work This game has a fixed resolution of 1280x720, and will black border around anything bigger. Not a Proton issue: https://steamcommunity.com/app/321870/discussions/0/616189742901165334/ Workaround is to set your screen resolution before opening the game
The resolution issue is with the game in general, not about Proton
title: Silence of the Sleep

notes: No issues found; run perfectly for my system.
title: Silence of the Sleep
